summary: Citibank's Subpoena Compliance Unit responds to a grand jury subpoena (Ref# 2019R01059) by providing bank records on a CD and noting the inability to locate original account applications or signature cards, with only an electronic signature provided for account ownership verification.

events.title: Citibank Response to Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: Citibank's Subpoena Compliance Unit sends a letter to the United States Attorney's Office enclosing a CD with bank records in response to Grand Jury Subpoena Ref# 2019R01059, noting the inability to locate original account applications/signature cards.

locations: Citibank, N.A. Subpoena Compliance Unit 100 Citibank Dr., Bldg.!, Flr. 2 San Antonio, TX 78245
United States Attorney Office Attn: AUSA 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena (Ref# 2019R01059) was issued to Citibank, likely as part of the Epstein investigation.
Citibank provided bank records on a CD but could not locate original account applications or signature cards.
The only information obtained regarding account ownership was an electronic signature.
The correspondence indicates active grand jury investigation into financial records as of September 2019.
